404.title: Sorry, page not found!
404.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. Perhaps you've mistyped the URL? Be sure to check your spelling.

403.title: No permission
403.description: The page you're trying access has restricted access. Please refer to your system administrator.

500.title: 500 Internal Server Error
500.description: There was an error, please try again later.

503.title: 503 Service Unavailable
503.description: There seems to be an issue with connecting to Tyro, please try again later.

unknown.title: Opps, something went wrong
unknown.description: If this problem persists, please contact support.
